hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: How we collect, use and protect your information.

intro: At SarMez Gıda, we value the privacy of our visitors. This Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights.

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
list: Name and email address via contact forms/newsletter signups.
Technical data (IP, browser, device details) – for security and analytics only.

sections.heading: 2. Use of Information
list: Improving site security and user experience

sections.heading: 3. Sharing
sections.paragraph: We do not sell personal data. We may share it only when required by law or with service providers (e.g., email delivery).

sections.heading: 4. Cookies
sections.paragraph: We may use cookies to improve your experience. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser.

sections.heading: 5. Your Rights
sections.paragraph: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data and to object to marketing communications.
